index_terms: CHICAGO MILWAUKEE ST. PAUL PACIFIC RAILROAD
summary: An ordinance relating to the franchise granted to Oregon-Washington Railroad & Navigation Company, Great Northern Railway Company, Northern Pacific Railway Company and Chicago, Milwaukee & St. Paul Railway Company, their successors and assigns, by Ordinance No. 38753, extending the term thereof to December 31, 1970, with right of termination after December 31, 1960, designating the present owners of said franchise and amending Sections 1, 10 and 11 accordingly.
